modify-function.inject-documentation: Returns a read only buffer object pointing to the segment of data that this resource represents. If the resource is compressed the data returns is compressed and qUncompress() must be used to access the data. If the resource is a directory None is returned.

add-function.inject-documentation: Like the method *findChild*, the first parameter should be the child's type.

add-function.signature: value(const QString&, const QVariant& @defaultValue@ = {}, PyObject* @type@ = nullptr)

add-function.inject-documentation: Returns the meta-method that corresponds to the given signal, or an invalid QMetaMethod if signal is not a signal of the class.
